Query.Sql: select distinct l1.RecordConnectionIdentifier, l1.NHSNumber, p.PrimaryProcedureDate, p.PrimaryProcedure from omop_staging.cds_line01 l1 inner join omop_staging.cds_procedure p on l1.MessageId = p.MessageId where l1.NHSNumber is not null;

Explanation.Description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
